summary: Encapsulates the fields of a Linux "cooked" (SLL) packet header, providing storage, string representation, and controlled access to attributes such as address, address length, ARP header, Ethernet type, header size, packet payload, and type information.
business_intent: Supports network analysis and monitoring tools by offering a structured, mutable representation of SLL headers, enabling easy inspection, modification, and logging of captured packets on Linux systems.
